head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CASHIN, JOHN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CASHIN, JOHN J.

block.p: CASHIN-John J., on September 9, 2000. Retired Battalion Chief, FDNY. Devoted husband of Marie (nee Phillips). Beloved father of Sr. Mary Ann Cashin, CSJ, Thomas and wife Sharon, John and wife Leslie, Brian and wife Kathleen, Delia Christgau, Terence and wife Maureen, James and wife Gerianne. Loving grandfather of 21 and great-grandfather of two. Reposing at Denis S. O'Connor Funeral Home, 91-05 Beach Channel Dr., Rockaway Beach, NY. Mass of Christian Burial on Wednesday, 9:30 AM, at St. Thomas More, Breezy Point. Interment St. Charles Cemetery. Visiting Monday and Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-10 PM. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be sent to Sisters of St. Joseph, Brentwood, NY.
